communications.communication:
To Whom It May Concern:

Pursuant to the Pennsylvania Right to Know Act, I hereby request the following records:

1. An accounting of all calls for service (sometimes referred to as "dispatch logs") between the dates of 1/1/20 and 3/31/23. Please provide these in the format in which they are currently stored in your system, which may be a database, spreadsheet, CSV file, or similar.

The database may include, but not be limited to, properties relating to: call date and time; origin of the call (police-initiated, 911 call, 311 call, etc.); who was dispatched; call disposition; call resolution time.

2. A data dictionary describing the properties present in the table, and how they relate to other records such as published incidents or arrests.
3. Any additional training materials or documentation for how this data is created or how it should be used internally.

If any part of this request is denied, please move forward with the remainder of the request and cite the relevant provisions in state law which justify the denial.

The requested documents will be made available to the general public, and this request is not being made for commercial purposes.

In the event that there are fees, I would be grateful if you would inform me of the total charges in advance of fulfilling my request. I would prefer the request filled electronically, by e-mail attachment if available or CD-ROM if not.

Thank you in advance for your anticipated cooperation in this matter. I look forward to receiving your response to this request within 5 business days, as the statute requires.

Sincerely,

Josh Chamberlain

To Whom It May Concern:

Pursuant to the Freedom of Information Act, I hereby request the following records:

All records relating to or mentioning Harry Belafonte (March 1, 1927 – April 25, 2023) - American singer, actor, and activist (see: https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Harry_Belafonte ).

Please see the following major news article as proof of death: https://www.theguardian.com/music/2023/apr/25/harry-belafonte-singer-dies-actor-singer-activist

The requested documents will be made available to the general public, and this request is not being made for commercial purposes.

In the event that there are fees, I would be grateful if you would inform me of the total charges in advance of fulfilling my request. I would prefer the request filled electronically, by e-mail attachment if available or CD-ROM if not.

Thank you in advance for your anticipated cooperation in this matter. I look forward to receiving your response to this request within 20 business days, as the statute requires.

Sincerely,

J Ader

To Whom It May Concern:

Pursuant to the Freedom of Information Act, I hereby request the following records:

All records relating to or mentioning Harry Belafonte (March 1, 1927 – April 25, 2023) - American singer, actor, and activist (see: https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Harry_Belafonte ).

Please conduct a thorough search of the Central Records System, including but not limited to the Electronic Surveillance (ELSUR) Indices, the Physical Surveillance (FISUR) Indices, the Microphone Surveillance (MISUR) Indices, and the Technical Surveillance (TESUR) Indices - for both main-file records and cross-reference records for all relevant names, individuals, agencies and companies. For reference, the associated file number for these records provided by the FBI is 105-HQ-70374.

If previously released records are available, then I request a rolling release consisting of those records while additional records are located and processed for release.

Please see the following major news article as proof of death: https://www.theguardian.com/music/2023/apr/25/harry-belafonte-singer-dies-actor-singer-activist

The requested documents will be made available to the general public, and this request is not being made for commercial purposes.

In the event that there are fees, I would be grateful if you would inform me of the total charges in advance of fulfilling my request. I would prefer the request filled electronically, by e-mail attachment if available or CD-ROM if not.

Thank you in advance for your anticipated cooperation in this matter. I look forward to receiving your response to this request within 20 business days, as the statute requires.

Sincerely,

J Ader

To Whom It May Concern:

Pursuant to the Freedom of Information Act, I hereby request the following records:

I am writing to request any and all files in connection with animal or livestock mutilations from 1967 through 2022. I believe these records are under the purview of the Wyoming Livestock Board.

As a citizen of the United States, I am entitled to access public records under the Freedom of Information Act (FOIA), 5 U.S.C. § 552. I request that you provide me with copies of all records, documents, notes, reports, and any other material related to animal or livestock mutilations that have been investigated by the Wyoming Livestock Board from January 1, 1967, to December 31, 2022.

Please provide me with any available information regarding the following:

The number of reported animal or livestock mutilations in Wyoming from 1967 to 2022.
The locations of the reported animal or livestock mutilations.
The number of investigations launched into these incidents.
The results of the investigations, including any reports, conclusions, or findings.

The requested documents will be made available to the general public, and this request is not being made for commercial purposes.

In the event that there are fees, I would be grateful if you would inform me of the total charges in advance of fulfilling my request. I would prefer the request filled electronically, by e-mail attachment if available or CD-ROM if not.

Thank you in advance for your anticipated cooperation in this matter. I look forward to receiving your response to this request within 20 business days, as the statute requires.

Sincerely,

Nathan Isaac
